v.desc: When LDAP over SSL/TLS is enabled, the LDAP client is required to have base64 encoded Active Directory Certificate Service's self-signed root CA certificate, this optional parameter is used only for dual protocol with LDAP user-mapping volumes.

values.desc: Active Directory created but not in use
Active Directory in use by SMB Volume

v.desc: Any details in regards to the Status of the Active Directory

sch.ov: Username of Active Directory domain administrator
sch.v: A domain user account with permission to create machine accounts
